name: Depth of Field Calculator
description: Calculate the depth of field for your camera and lens combination. Understand how aperture, focal length, and distance affect your photos.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-aperture size-5"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle><path d="m14.31 8 5.74 9.94"></path><path d="M9.69 8h11.48"></path><path d="m7.38 12 5.74-9.94"></path><path d="M9.69 16 3.95 6.06"></path><path d="M14.31 16H2.83"></path><path d="m16.62 12-5.74 9.94"></path></svg>

name: Exposure Calculator
description: Calculate proper exposure settings using the exposure triangle. Balance ISO, shutter speed, and aperture for perfect exposure.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-camera size-5"><path d="M14.5 4h-5L7 7H4a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v9a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h16a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V9a2 2 0 0 0-2-2h-3l-2.5-3z"></path><circle cx="12" cy="13" r="3"></circle></svg>

name: Long Exposure Calculator
description: Calculate long exposure times when using ND filters. Get precise exposure times for landscape and motion blur-sm photography.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-timer size-5"><line x1="10" x2="14" y1="2" y2="2"></line><line x1="12" x2="15" y1="14" y2="11"></line><circle cx="12" cy="14" r="8"></circle></svg>

name: Focal Length Calculator
description: Calculate equivalent focal lengths across different sensor sizes. Understand how crop factor affects your lens choices.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-image size-5"><rect width="18" height="18" x="3" y="3" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><circle cx="9" cy="9" r="2"></circle><path d="m21 15-3.086-3.086a2 2 0 0 0-2.828 0L6 21"></path></svg>

name: Photography Gear ROI Calculator
description: Calculate return on investment for photography equipment based on gear costs, rental rates, and shoot frequency.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-camera size-5"><path d="M14.5 4h-5L7 7H4a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v9a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h16a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V9a2 2 0 0 0-2-2h-3l-2.5-3z"></path><circle cx="12" cy="13" r="3"></circle></svg>
